title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When selecting Close All Saved from the file menu, the file f1.txt does not always close.
EB: The file f1.txt should be closed as no changes have been made.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, 1. Close all open editors. 2. Create a new file f1.txt. 3. Select Close All Saved from the file menu.
